replies.body:
To be fair, this nerf is so so late to the party.

Sated devourer junglers are much much better than gragas in the late game ( some can even build tanky)
Wish they at least standardized his damage ( i.e 10% at all ranks)

For me, League was on it's best when the endless farm fest was real
{{champion:79}} GRAGGY MAX: 1000 CS{{item:2041}}

I really wish they would revert this or at least change the damage from 70% to 90% or reduce the base damage a little and give it the full damage amount. Anything really. He hasn't been that good in a solo lane in over a year.
Because someone who built full tank and still 1v1s me as an adc with crazy amount of damage is fucking retarded.

>
> Because someone who built full tank and still 1v1s me as an adc with crazy amount of damage is fucking retarded.

so your saying because your an adc you should auto win against a tank? and the reason he does dmg to you is cuz you don't have any hp or defence...
You aren't yet level 30 to get full experienced games ( masteries, runes ).
Nice try, but I'm Diamond V.
Ok but the situation u are describing depends on things, what acc were u playing, was he already fed, did he have thornmail, what adc did u play... etc
Wait... you're diamond V and couldn't kite him? XD Especially if it's 1v1.. what adc do you play? Gragas adc? XD

> [{quoted}](name=LoL aint life,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=fGEA7x31,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-08-22T15:09:47.154+0000)

> Because someone who built full tank and still 1v1s me as an adc with crazy amount of damage is fucking retarded.

But you are full glass cannon, so it goes both ways. ADCs arent meant to be good 1v1 duelists in general, other than the likes of Vayne.


I mean, Gragas' win and pick-rate are pretty trash atm. Does he really need such a major nerf?

Yeah, hard to see why they are planning to nerf some of the weakest champions in the game on the live patch next round like him and Maoki (top lane is now full of split pushers that ignore his ult with true damage).

Moa'Kai is far from weak.

Personally I've been waiting for nerfs on him for a while.

Anyone that plays tanks top has realized how obnoxious that champion is.
I liked AP Gragas. Just can't muster the sympathy for this Tahm Kench wannabe.
Well, to be fair, he does a fuckton of damage for a tank. It only makes sense his damage is reduced.

Okay...

I don't have much sympathy for Gragas to be honest... but that pic is awesome.

I mean it looks like they really don't know what the want from grag.

They didn't like him being an AP, so they turned him into a tank.

They don't like him being a tank, so they are now nerfing his bases, which will effectively turn him back into an AP.

gg

Maybe they need to do the same thing that they did on Sejuani: a 0.55 scaling

8 / 8.5 / 9 / 9.5 / 10 %

Nowdays the Tank Junglers are in the deeps of the shadows of the devourer junglers, I really miss the tank meta :(
